attributes.title: I’m heart broken
attributes.review: This app jump out of my phone and mercilessly kicked the crap out of me in front of my wife and 7 children. It cracked 3 ribs, broke my orbital socket in my left eye, and dislocated my shoulder. Please, if you value your life, or comfort, don’t download this app.

attributes.title: Where my Money
attributes.review: So where’s my money 💵 you owe me for ordering your two Front from China Center you are getting rid of everything from China  in the us minus well get rid of that  to Front because it’s made from China

attributes.title: this app broke my phone!!
attributes.review: ive supported trump since the beginning (trump 2020🇺🇸) but this app is absolutely horrible. it took around 27.4 hours to download, and when i did the app wouldn’t open. when i finally opened the app, it asked for personal information and was hard to navigate!! then immediately my phone shut down and i had to get a new one!! i love my president and country but this app is practically communist propaganda!!!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever made
attributes.review: This is quite literally the worst app ever made. This actually has the chance to be the lowest rated app in history. Idiots made this app. Idiots use this app. Remove this app from the app store if you want to improve this country!

attributes.title: It’s truly awful
attributes.review: The app has crashed millions of times and took a whole decade to download. Whatever you do, don’t waste your time on this garbage app. Honestly, I wish I could give it a zero star rating.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: This app cause a virus to get onto my phone i had to get a WHOLE new phone and lose EVERYTHING i had on my old one, my trump supporters of u want to have to keep paying for a new phone then get this if not don’t get it....matter a fact DONT SUPPORT HIM🙂

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This took so long to download and nobody likes trump tbh he doesn’t even treat  his son like a human please delete it we don’t need this what we do need is to make this app go away please make this go away I am sick of trump being president

attributes.title: WARNING: horrible app🤢🤢🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: I got this app to support our loving president❤️. It took 40 HOURS to download and the quality was simply unacceptable! It diminished my battery health by 15 PERCENT within one day of using it!! Truly a HORRIBLE app and I hope no one else ha s the misfortune of downloading it.

attributes.title: Not user friendly
attributes.review: This app is hard to use and not user friendly at all. Also a lot of false Info and I don’t think this is actually trump making any posts

attributes.title: HORRIBLE. DO NOT GET APP.
attributes.review: It took so long to downloading ad this app. Over 24 hours!! And then I tried to go on it and it CRASHED!!! I had to delete it and try to redownload but it didn’t work. Just overall horrible...if I could rate 0 stars I would
